main.name: Elijah Wong
main.occupation: Lead AI Engineer, builder and problem solver.
main.description: I like to build solution, develop model, and make simulation. My interests are in the field of AI/ML, Blockchain and Science in general
main.bio: I'm a physics trained AI engineer that specialized in ML model development and pipeline, as well as data analytics and statistics. My current interests are in the area of LLM finetuning and applied transfer learning
main.contactmessage: Please contact me if you are interested in my work or have any questions.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
